items.sentence: Tom went into a coma and never regained consciousness.
Tom came out of the hospital with a smile on his face.
I wanted to go outside, but my mother wouldn't let me.
At that time, I didn't yet know what Tom wanted to do.
I asked Tom to find out where Mary had parked her car.
I just haven't had a chance to talk to Tom about that.
I don't want to do anything that would make Tom angry.
I didn't want to say anything that might make Tom mad.
I couldn't find a single picture of Tom wearing a hat.
Tom asked Mary if she understood what she ought to do.
